title: Loss run reports to reinsurers
dataVerified: Ceding company, reinsurer, individual claim details, reserves, payments, development
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents altered loss runs (hiding adverse claims development). Domain binding verifies ceding company. Reinsurer audit verification. Treaty compliance. Claims development tracking. Multi-page: Loss runs are detailed multi-page claims listings.
